record.darwin:Remarks: Determination is somewhat tentative. Scales in lateral series ca.29-30; upper lip with outer row of close set fine teeth, no inner rows apparent at this size; gill rakers on lower limb ca. 45-46; transverse scales 9-10, anal rays 9; scales ctenoid, no membranous projections on posterior scale edge; adipose lid covers ca.1/3 iris; preorbital slight kink, very serrate. Determination per Harrision and Senou (1999 - FAO Western Pacific Guide) - Wayne C. Starnes, 2006.
